>
[Bubbling Scale](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1497)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Threshold of Knowledge</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Threshold of Knowledge](/Sources.aspx?ID=109) pg. 10</row>

**Price** 5 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This dark, iridescent scale is about the size of a small coin. When you swallow the scale, you immediately grow a patch of scales that cover the majority of your body. For 1 hour, you can hold your breath for 15 rounds plus your Constitution modifier (instead of 5 rounds + your Constitution modifier) before [drowning](/Rules.aspx?ID=468). It has no effect in non-aquatic environments that require you to hold your breath. After this time, the scales wither and fall off your body.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
